Combat Maneuver Light load Medium load Heavy load Overload Success Failure Caster Level Modifier Attack Modifier Damage Modifier Whisper? Public Roll Whisper Roll Bonus Dice Mod #1 #2 #3 #4 #5 #6 #7 #8 #9 Blinded: –4 penalty on most STR and DEX based skill checks. Blinded: –4 penalty on opposed Perception skill checks. Dazzled: –1 penalty on sight-based Perception checks. Deafened: automatically fails Perception checks based on sound, takes a –4 penalty on opposed Perception checks. Deafened: 20% chance of spell failure when casting spells with verbal components. Fascinated: –4 penalty on skill checks made as reactions, such as Perception checks. Grappled: –2 penalty on all combat maneuver checks, except those made to grapple or escape a grapple. Invisible: +2 bonus on attack rolls against sighted opponents, and ignores its opponents' Dexterity bonuses to AC (if any). Prone defender: +4 bonus to AC against ranged attacks, –4 penalty to AC against melee attacks. Prone attacker: –4 penalty on melee attack rolls and cannot use a ranged weapon (except for a crossbow). Sickened: –2 penalty on weapon damage rolls. Attack Crit confirm Critical damage Damage2
